entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 30%

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 13 April 2023
